.. _example_link:

This is a Title
===============

This is an example page in which I will practise writing some reST.

This is a sub-heading
---------------------

This is a *simple* list:

* With a bullet point 
* And another bullet point 

And this is an **ordered** list:

#. Item 1
#. Item 2
#. Item ...
#. Item n

Here is a gallery section
-------------------------
As well as embedding images into the document: 

.. figure:: /imgs/saturn.jpg
   :alt: Saturn
   :align: center
   :scale: 50%

   *Figure of Saturn*

It is also possible to use images inline, such as this RMS Node icon |pdslink_icon|

.. |pdslink_icon| image:: /imgs/document_pdslink.png
                  :scale: 30%

And you can also embed movies:

.. raw:: html
         :align: center

   <iframe width="673" height="385" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1ofe3acF2CE" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
